name: Snong (MageTrash)
description:
Snake and pong, what more would you want? A funky mashup of these two retro classics, with a little pac-treat, meant to be as snongy as possible. 

Can you survive the gruellingly (straightforward) singleplayer campaign, or will you duke it out with some local multiplayer? Either way, you're getting snonged ;))

Controls are WASD/arrows, with multiplayer being WASD on left/red, arrows for right/blue. Controllers might be supported!

Attributions:

Other such attributions may be found here.

Created by Justin K, Adi B, Justin X and Imre. Made for GDG 2022 Jam 2 - "Classic with a Twist".

(Ok but fr we did wanna add a visual story aspect, we just had no time lmao)
